snmp
Class SNMPInformRequestSenderInterface

java.lang.Object
  snmp.SNMPInformRequestSenderInterface
public class SNMPInformRequestSenderInterface
extends java.lang.Object

The class SNMPInformRequestSenderInterface implements an interface for sending SNMPv2 inform request messages to a remote SNMP manager. The approach is that from version 2c of SNMP, using no encryption of data. Communication occurs via UDP, port 162, the standard SNMP trap port, as the destination port, unless an alternate (non-standard) port is specified in the constructor.
